metadata.description: Test suite for calendar management tools with verification (make_calendar, list_calendars, update_calendar, delete_calendar)

test_cases.name: Create new calendar
test_cases.user_query: Create a new calendar called 'Team Events' with a blue color for events only
test_cases.rationale: Create a new calendar collection with properties

test_cases.name: Verify calendar creation
test_cases.user_query: Show me all my calendars to verify the new one was created
test_cases.rationale: Verify that calendar was created successfully

test_cases.name: Create calendar with description
test_cases.user_query: Make a new events-only calendar named 'Project X' with description 'For tracking project milestones'

test_cases.name: Update calendar color
test_cases.user_query: Change the color of my Work calendar to red
test_cases.rationale: Calendar property update - use update_calendar for color changes

test_cases.name: Rename calendar
test_cases.user_query: Rename my personal calendar to 'Dave's Calendar'

test_cases.name: Delete calendar permanently
test_cases.user_query: Delete my Old Projects calendar permanently
test_cases.rationale: Permanent calendar deletion - use delete_calendar, warns about deleting all events

test_cases.name: Verify calendar deletion
test_cases.user_query: List all calendars to confirm the deletion
test_cases.rationale: Verify that calendar was deleted successfully
